name: The Secret Of The Orange Rooms
name_original: The Secret Of The Orange Rooms
description:
Story
You are in a room that consists of orange rooms, in each room you will find various puzzles that you need to pass using cubes of different colors. Go through the rooms and do not forget your friend, a white cube that will be slightly larger than all the others. Go through all the rooms and solve the mystery of this strange place with him. They say they treat cubes badly here
Control
1. WASD to Move
2. Space to Jump
3. R to restore the position of the cubes
4. T to restore the position of the player and his friend, works only in those places where you can fall
5. Move the cubes to complete the game
Attention
There are no saves in the game, if you close the game, then you will have to start all over again. The cube will be waiting for you on one of the levels, just don't forget it
